name: Express Uptimer
description: Uptimer you can host yourself to keep your websites online!

name: Golf Course
description: Play minigolf in this pixel art browser game.

name: Atom One Dark for Replit.com
description: The popular Visual Studio Code theme ported to Replit.com

name: Advanced Theme Editor
description: Ultimate Editor for Replit themes. Change the JSON of a theme directly and save it using the Replit API.

name: Replit Profile Viewer
description: Alternative profile page for Replit users. Get repls, roles and languages from users using Replit's GraphQL API.

name: Yoghart
description: Yoghart is a team that makes generative art. We use p5.js to generate random images.

name: Mark's Food Place
description: Run a restaurant in this game made with Kaboom.js. Winner of MarkJam 5.

name: Windows HTML (OLD)
description: Old windows "parody" of Windows 10. Create files with Notepad and save them on your desktop.
